Blog.post: i saw ****** and ****** 2day ..hahah..crazylar..i was stalkin at dat sumone n it was like so obvious...haha...sum gud news 2day..my class presiden gonna transfer 2 dunno which skool..haha..

went 2 skool 2 get report card 2day..bleks...dat zombie complain 2 my mum sayin dat i talk a lot in the class...babi..luckily my mum din scold me haha...im sooo bored again..soo dissapointed 2day..din get 2 see ****** and ****** haha..it seems they went 2 skool 2day but i din see them..dissapointed but nvmlar monday muz go skool n see them haha...i sound soo crazy over them..haha nvmlar..im soo bored..

another boring day...i juz hate dat annoyin gurl...she's blaming me 4 evrythin...and i dun knoe wat 2 do...vic hung keep askin me 2 ignore her but i think it's a good advice...and i juz wan 2 knoe wat actually happened and im so blur~~...i got my test results and im sooo dissapointed wif my science results...as usual gossiping wif my frens and i got the latest news 2day...may yin n i saw sumthin happen at the canteen!!(FJA and SY hubungan sulit)..haha jk

i did my test kh n geo badly...haih...i was soo annoyed 2day...dat idiot din tell me wat exactly im suppose 2 say n she blame me...so smart she ownself tell her ler..idiot..i was soo damn angry...suddenly she came n scold me...f*** her ler...n da other gurl who suppose 2 knoe wat time dun knoe how 2 find out herself...idiot ler dey all...went 2 skool 2day 2 do projek n loiter around...got 2 go tuition later...saw *****e 2day...haha...sooo cute....akaka...damn boring lar....waitin 2 see joo ann's blog...

yeah...dats me...well actually it wasn't my fault....yesterday,i was asked 2 blend fuit juice...i was lazy 2 use the juicer so i use the blender instead...n i dun knoe how the thing came off n the juice spilt all over n i got 2 clean it...lukily my mum din see the mess cuz dat time she was bz watchin tv...n i clear up evrything 2 hapuskan bukti...immediately after cleanin it my mum went 2 the kitchen n i was lucky enuf cuz she din see the mess...n i was not careful enuf my mum saw the cloth was purple in color..well i was blendin beetroot, grapefruit wif lemon juice...n luckily my mum din scold me...haha...lame!!test is tomorrow n imagine how lazy i am...i'm suppose 2 be studyin now...bye...got 2 study now

din blog 4 almost a week...well i was not feelin well...all bcuz of may yin's poisonous food(jokin)...well i was stalkin at leng cai's a few days ago...went 2 ying fang's house on monday n stalkin at leng cai but din reali see his face....alll bucz of yamunaah...i was lookin at dat leng cai n yamunaah suddenly came n push me away...haha but at last she tak dapat see dat lengcai oso..haha afterdoin projek we went out 2 spy at dat leng cai's house n i miss dat throwin aeroplane session cuz my mum came early...n a few anak ayam ran 2wards dat leng cai's house 2 throw their aeroplane..haha u all tot i din see kah???...ish but we still tak dapat see dat leng cai...menurut ying fang he very lengcai but i saw half of da body oni but he's tall ler...side oso can se e he slightly leng cai ler but i dun think he s as leng cai as 1 of my tuitionmate....hahah... lame..n yesterday dat ****** came out of da class n i was near dere helpin tchear 2 carry sum stuff into da koperasi n ****** was standin near dere n she was lookin at me,yamu n kastturi...n i think she wan 2 talk 2 1 of us...haha...n 2day i was stalkin at ****** da form 4 gurl...haha...she's sooo cute..haha...lame...gtg edi...kena halau again

din get 2 blog yesterday all bcuz of my bro....yesterday went 2 jj wif joo ann n su ling n met huey ching dere...weent mcd and saw tan kok yen...den we go shoppin 2 get sumbody's present..den we went sumwhere near da cinema n saw joo ann's twins,winnie..and we continue shoppin den we watch mean girls wif rebecca...smuggle in n dat fella bz collectin tickets n din realise i went in...a lame guy sat bhind us n he was sooo dame lame...after movie we saw pn nabsiah,our skool's pengetua...wanted 2 stalk at her but she walk 2 fast so din manage 2 stalk her...haha...n 2day was so dame funny wif lame jokes n i bought a dictionary 2 skool n my frens r bz findin words such as orgasmic etc etc...ahaha...n we was like soo dirty minded..haha...n it was soo funny...haha...anyways gtg

haha..went 2 skool 4 hari kecemerlangan 2 see ppl have fun...haha...it was soooo fun 2day...as i said'hari yg paling bahagia untk joo ann n ju lin' haha...havin fun pushin them 2gether n takin photo 4 them....im waitin 2 see da photos...haha....oso took ******'s photo haha(i think her sis is in da photo oso)...n sk fall off her bike shud hav see it but there's a car blockin...saw ju lin's std 1 photo n she was soooo cute..haha...n im soo darn bored

haha...saw ****** 2day n she's wif glasses..haha..wonder wat 2 buy 4 sumone's b'day..im soo bored(as usual)..n luff like mad cuz of hie phin's lame jokes...haha...so darn embarrasin lar...my fren was crappin in front of sy sayin i like her...ish dey gonna get it....a few days ago,yamu went n say hi 2 ****** n i frgot her response..haha

went 2 school 2 see sum chinese singing competition..n did sum lame stuff....n dat linda daringly touch ******'s bag n she pass by n she saw but she din even bother 2 ask linda y she touch her bag...haha..n dat linda so crazy...call her so many times n dat may yin n chandini oso another 1 pushin me in front of her.....haha....sound so friggin lame...n dat linda cycle 2 my house juz now juz 2 pass me sum cd's..yea n went 2 tution 2day n dat teacher say i look very queer last time...haha n i improve edi...bleks....im da youngest in da class of cuz i look queer lar...haha...n 2day oni i realise my uncle was in da yakult ad...haha...im soo damn bored...n yea so unfair my sis got new hp...ish...nowadays bertaubat edi...din curse teacher..haha....im soo damn bored... Winamp: Ayumi Hamasaki-Voyage

aaaaa....im juz soo sad....i shudnt see wat im not suppose 2 see...i accidentally saw sumbody's blog n i saw sumthin....aaaa...y on earth i read her blog...haih...now i knoe sumthin...so sad 2day lar...damn it...better not talk bout dat...got my bm paper 2day n as usual i got low marks...dat bugger yarha dun wan 2 gimme 2 marks....went 2 skool as usual n saw both of them...n stalkin at 1 of them cuz me n my frens r practicin sumthin near da lab...haih....sooo damn dissapointed n y on earth i read her blog....ntg much 2 blog lar...no mood 2 blog..n y????y on earth i read da blog????...sob sob.... Winamp: Coco Lee-Baby I'm Sorry

bored...yesterday was may yin's b'day...went 2 her house 2 do geografi projek...haih..went 2 skool n dat biatch say she'll change my place but i got 2 wait...as if lar i can wait 4 her 2 change...i think she'll take months 2 change my place...yea n 2day got back my eng paper....n damn it dat arbaiah was sooo damn annoyin...n she was soooooooo damn blind although she has 4 eyes....it was soo obvious i wrote PHILIPPE n she say i wrote PHILLIPE wif two L n wtf,i mean i asked sooo many ppl and dey say i wrote 1 L n it was SOOOO CLEAR dere is only 1 L...mabe she's an L..haha...n damn it she juz dun wan 2 giv me dat 2 marks im suppose 2 get bcuz i knoe she doesn't lyk me n my group...fark her lar...she was soo blind n dah lar i got soo low n she dun wan giv me dat blardee 2 marks...f*ck her lar...im soo damn angry....i was suppose 2 be da third highest 4 eng in class but wtf she juz dun wan 2 giv me dat 2 marks...n may yin got the highest(as usual)...n dat papaya was soo blardee not suppose 2 be a teacher...n a few days ago she juz mention dis "girls please keep ur mouth SHUT" n dat time da class wasn't dat noisy n she mention it twice...bleks..im juz soo angry wif her n she ambil kesempatan not 2 giv me marks...pity ying fang...juz hope he won't get scoldin by her dad...all bcuz of dat papaya...haih...im soo damn bored...n i did badly dis time compare 2 the mid year exam..haih...i'll wait 2 see which tcher will annoy me tomoro...im sooo damn bored..-_-" Winamp:F.I.R.-Lydia

went 2 jj wif chan n ying fang 2 get may yin's birthday present...bought a chain n a shirt 4 her...me,may yin,chan,ying fang got the same chain...oh n yamu also bought dat chain earlier so 5 of us got da same chain...went 2 my cuz house 2 celebrate her birthday..i think she is 2 years old....play bkb wif my cuzins...play wif those monkeys can really kill me...sum play until so damn ganas n sum play till so lousy...haih....n pity me n my cuzin...those few monkeys cuzins of mine age 4-11 bully me n my cuzin....n dere r younger den us but we get bullied...dey were lyk shoutin here n dere n show us their temper..i dun give a damn k..shout all u wan lar...n me n my cuzin organize sum games n we got screwed up by those monkeys n haha dey din get 2 play any games...haha...n shania was sooo cute 2day...my aunt bought her a barney birthday cake since she lyk barney...gtg n disturb ppl...

dat biatch din cum 2 skool 2day...i think she's scare 2 see me...haha..n if she cums on mon i'll make sure she'll change my place...n most of the teachers in our skool are lame e.g mr teh,pn arbaiah,pn hafizan etc etc...n can u imagine a TEACHER USIN RUDE WORDS 2 SCOLD STUDENTS??actually it wasn't dat rude but if it was used by a TEACHER(person who teaches us n gives us good knowledge)actually it wasnt dat bad..she juz said dis "girls please keep ur mouth SHUT" n she used it more den once...n mr teh is orgasmic...as usual me,may yin n chan sit the same row n dis week our row gets 2 sit in front so dis is wat hapened 2 us 2day..chan was bz playin n suddenly dat mr teh ask y u all touchhin here n dere...den we were lyk starin at him..n he ask chan 2 sit beside him 2 toush him...imagine how orgasmic he is...lyk wat evelyn said 2 her chem tchear"she had bad sex last night" mabe mr teh also had bad sex last night dats y he's orgasmic...n got back so many test results n i did so badly...n im soo damn happy cuz im chattin wif *****n..hehe Winamp: The Corrs-Summer Sunshine

n i forgot 2 tell u dat biatch change my place juz bcuz i was sittin da place beside me n she fuckin change my place...imagine how lame she is...juz bcuz of dat she changed my place...im repeatin-"if dat fuckin biatch din change my place 2 a better place tomoro she'll be fuckin dead"

annoyed by dat bitch 2day...wanna knoe who is dat bitch???HAFIZAN BT. SARIAT...dat bitch change my place 2day..she change my place 2 the place i hate most...fuck her lar...i was cursin her from skool till now,can u imagine how bitchy she is???...when i was talkin 2 her she fuckin runaway n i was lyk luffin at her...as if im gonna eat her or sumthin liddat...n da way she run it was lyk so damn bitchy n she almost fall...haha...im not stupid 2 chase after her...so wat i care if she dun wan 2 hear me explainin 2 her....n evryone knoes dat she's damn bitchy n lyks 2 crap a lot...durin seni on mon,dat bitch bz crappin n she change sum students place in bilik seni n dat bitch even change chan n kas place...HAFIZAN IS A BITCH...n i think she's worst den a female dog....haha...n yea she's also worst den a mak gorilla but she say we r lyk mak gorilla n she was bz crappin almost 3\4 period durin seni...n i want dat bitch 2 fuvckin change my place n if she dun she's really gonna get it from me...wat i care if she's my class teacher.....dat fukin biatch is really gonna be dead...HAFIZAN BT. SARIAT is a bitch.....sry 4 usin bad words here but im really annoyed n mad of dat bitch....n da cursin goes on......anyway those who read dis plz dun tell dat bitch.... winamp: Fish Leong-Bu Xiang Shui

din blog 4 almost a week...well i was not feelin well...all bcuz of may yin's poisonous food(jokin)...well i was stalkin at leng cai's a few days ago...went 2 ying fang's house on monday n stalkin at leng cai but din reali see his face....alll bucz of yamunaah...i was lookin at dat leng cai n yamunaah suddenly came n push me away...haha but at last she tak dapat see dat lengcai oso..haha afterdoin projek we went out 2 spy at dat leng cai's house n i miss dat throwin aeroplane session cuz my mum came early...n a few anak ayam ran 2wards dat leng cai's house 2 throw their aeroplane..haha u all tot i din see kah???...ish but we still tak dapat see dat leng cai...menurut ying fang he very lengcai but i saw half of da body oni but he's tall ler...side oso can se e he slightly leng cai ler but i dun think he s as leng cai as 1 of my tuitionmate....hahah... lame..n yesterday dat ****** came out of da class n i was near dere helpin tchear 2 carry sum stuff into da koperasi n ****** was standin near dere n she was lookin at me,yamu n kastturi...n i think she wan 2 talk 2 1 of us...haha...n 2day i was stalkin at ****** da form 4 gurl...haha...she's sooo cute..haha...lame...gtg edi...kena halau again

din get 2 blog yesterday all bcuz of my bro....yesterday went 2 jj wif joo ann n su ling n met huey ching dere...weent mcd and saw tan kok yen...den we go shoppin 2 get sumbody's present..den we went sumwhere near da cinema n saw joo ann's twins,winnie..and we continue shoppin den we watch mean girls wif rebecca...smuggle in n dat fella bz collectin tickets n din realise i went in...a lame guy sat bhind us n he was sooo dame lame...after movie we saw pn nabsiah,our skool's pengetua...wanted 2 stalk at her but she walk 2 fast so din manage 2 stalk her...haha...n 2day was so dame funny wif lame jokes n i bought a dictionary 2 skool n my frens r bz findin words such as orgasmic etc etc...ahaha...n we was like soo dirty minded..haha...n it was soo funny...haha...anyways gtg

haha..went 2 skool 4 hari kecemerlangan 2 see ppl have fun...haha...it was soooo fun 2day...as i said'hari yg paling bahagia untk joo ann n ju lin' haha...havin fun pushin them 2gether n takin photo 4 them....im waitin 2 see da photos...haha....oso took ******'s photo haha(i think her sis is in da photo oso)...n sk fall off her bike shud hav see it but there's a car blockin...saw ju lin's std 1 photo n she was soooo cute..haha...n im soo darn bored

haha...saw ****** 2day n she's wif glasses..haha..wonder wat 2 buy 4 sumone's b'day..im soo bored(as usual)..n luff like mad cuz of hie phin's lame jokes...haha...so darn embarrasin lar...my fren was crappin in front of sy sayin i like her...ish dey gonna get it....a few days ago,yamu went n say hi 2 ****** n i frgot her response..haha

went 2 school 2 see sum chinese singing competition..n did sum lame stuff....n dat linda daringly touch ******'s bag n she pass by n she saw but she din even bother 2 ask linda y she touch her bag...haha..n dat linda so crazy...call her so many times n dat may yin n chandini oso another 1 pushin me in front of her.....haha....sound so friggin lame...n dat linda cycle 2 my house juz now juz 2 pass me sum cd's..yea n went 2 tution 2day n dat teacher say i look very queer last time...haha n i improve edi...bleks....im da youngest in da class of cuz i look queer lar...haha...n 2day oni i realise my uncle was in da yakult ad...haha...im soo damn bored...n yea so unfair my sis got new hp...ish...nowadays bertaubat edi...din curse teacher..haha....im soo damn bored... bored...yesterday was may yin's b'day...went 2 her house 2 do geografi projek...haih..went 2 skool n dat biatch say she'll change my place but i got 2 wait...as if lar i can wait 4 her 2 change...i think she'll take months 2 change my place...yea n 2day got back my eng paper....n damn it dat arbaiah was sooo damn annoyin...n she was soooooooo damn blind although she has 4 eyes....it was soo obvious i wrote PHILIPPE n she say i wrote PHILLIPE wif two L n wtf,i mean i asked sooo many ppl and dey say i wrote 1 L n it was SOOOO CLEAR dere is only 1 L...mabe she's an L..haha...n damn it she juz dun wan 2 giv me dat 2 marks im suppose 2 get bcuz i knoe she doesn't lyk me n my group...fark her lar...she was soo blind n dah lar i got soo low n she dun wan giv me dat blardee 2 marks...f*ck her lar...im soo damn angry....i was suppose 2 be da third highest 4 eng in class but wtf she juz dun wan 2 giv me dat 2 marks...n may yin got the highest(as usual)...n dat papaya was soo blardee not suppose 2 be a teacher...n a few days ago she juz mention dis "girls please keep ur mouth SHUT" n dat time da class wasn't dat noisy n she mention it twice...bleks..im juz soo angry wif her n she ambil kesempatan not 2 giv me marks...pity ying fang...juz hope he won't get scoldin by her dad...all bcuz of dat papaya...haih...im soo damn bored...n i did badly dis time compare 2 the mid year exam..haih...i'll wait 2 see which tcher will annoy me tomoro...im sooo damn bored..-_-" Winamp:F.I.R.-Lydia

went 2 jj wif chan n ying fang 2 get may yin's birthday present...bought a chain n a shirt 4 her...me,may yin,chan,ying fang got the same chain...oh n yamu also bought dat chain earlier so 5 of us got da same chain...went 2 my cuz house 2 celebrate her birthday..i think she is 2 years old....play bkb wif my cuzins...play wif those monkeys can really kill me...sum play until so damn ganas n sum play till so lousy...haih....n pity me n my cuzin...those few monkeys cuzins of mine age 4-11 bully me n my cuzin....n dere r younger den us but we get bullied...dey were lyk shoutin here n dere n show us their temper..i dun give a damn k..shout all u wan lar...n me n my cuzin organize sum games n we got screwed up by those monkeys n haha dey din get 2 play any games...haha...n shania was sooo cute 2day...my aunt bought her a barney birthday cake since she lyk barney...gtg n disturb ppl...

dat biatch din cum 2 skool 2day...i think she's scare 2 see me...haha..n if she cums on mon i'll make sure she'll change my place...n most of the teachers in our skool are lame e.g mr teh,pn arbaiah,pn hafizan etc etc...n can u imagine a TEACHER USIN RUDE WORDS 2 SCOLD STUDENTS??actually it wasn't dat rude but if it was used by a TEACHER(person who teaches us n gives us good knowledge)actually it wasnt dat bad..she juz said dis "girls please keep ur mouth SHUT" n she used it more den once...n mr teh is orgasmic...as usual me,may yin n chan sit the same row n dis week our row gets 2 sit in front so dis is wat hapened 2 us 2day..chan was bz playin n suddenly dat mr teh ask y u all touchhin here n dere...den we were lyk starin at him..n he ask chan 2 sit beside him 2 toush him...imagine how orgasmic he is...lyk wat evelyn said 2 her chem tchear"she had bad sex last night" mabe mr teh also had bad sex last night dats y he's orgasmic...n got back so many test results n i did so badly...n im soo damn happy cuz im chattin wif *****n..hehe Winamp: The Corrs-Summer Sunshine
